${ModID}:FlyingSwords.NAME: Flying Swords
${ModID}:FlyingSwords.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy twice. NL Startup: Gain !M! Plated Armor.

${ModID}:GeoDaRay.NAME: Geo Da Ray
${ModID}:GeoDaRay.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Windrush and ${ModID}:Precision for each enemy in combat. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Overpressure.NAME: Overpressure
${ModID}:Overpressure.FLAVOR: So... you dare to defy me?!

${ModID}:TradeWinds.NAME: Trade Winds
${ModID}:TradeWinds.DESCRIPTION: Discover an Attack. NL If it is common, heal !M! HP, or if it is rare, lose !${ModID}:m2! gold. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Discover an upgraded Attack. NL If it is common, heal
HP, or if it is rare, lose

${ModID}:TempestOfStrikes.NAME: Tempest of Strikes
${ModID}:TempestOfStrikes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! ${ModID}:Bind a number of times equal to half of the number of Attacks in your deck (

${ModID}:FallOver.NAME: Fall Over
${ModID}:FallOver.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Bind to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:FallOver.FLAVOR: Stay still... and let me slay you!

${ModID}:FeedingWinds.NAME: Feeding Winds
${ModID}:FeedingWinds.DESCRIPTION: Gain ${ModID}:Windrush equal to the number of Attacks in your hand. NL Startup: ${ModID}:Modify !M! random Attacks: "Gain 1 Strength"
${ModID}:FeedingWinds.FLAVOR: Let's see just how strong I am!

${ModID}:EscalatingBreeze.NAME: Escalating Breeze
${ModID}:EscalatingBreeze.DESCRIPTION: Retain up to !M! card. NL Attacks Retained this way cost !${ModID}:m2! less next turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: cards. NL Attacks Retained this way cost

${ModID}:GaleForce.NAME: Gale-Force
${ModID}:GaleForce.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, gain ${ModID}:Windrush equal to its cost +!M!. NL Whenever you play an Attack with a cost of !${ModID}:m2! or greater, draw a card.

${ModID}:DownwindBlow.NAME: Downwind Blow
${ModID}:DownwindBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Precision. NL Take !${ModID}:m2!% less damage from attacks this turn.
